content.html: "That was my dad. People used to call his number by mistake so he kept a timetable by the phone. He passed away last year." "I'm so sorry. He was a lovely man." "Thank you. Let me see if I can find the timetable." "It's ok, Robert & I will just try our luck. Thank you." 11/12
content.value:
"That was my dad. People used to call his number by mistake so he kept a timetable by the phone. He passed away last year."
"I'm so sorry. He was a lovely man."
"Thank you. Let me see if I can find the timetable."
"It's ok, Robert & I will just try our luck. Thank you."
11/12
